Html: It is not clear to me how CC-BY-SA applies to software. If I dynamically link to HTML Agility Pack assemblies without modifying them, is it a Collective Work, or is it a Derived Work? In other words, do I need to put my own assemblies under CC-BY-SA, or not?
I don't know either.  I think the current licensing agreement says that if you perform an interpretive dance about HtmlAgilityPack, then you would have to display the URL somewhere on the stage.
